00005 #ifndef LUABIND_EXCEPTION_HANDLER_050601_HPP
00006 # define LUABIND_EXCEPTION_HANDLER_050601_HPP
00007 
00008 # include <luabind/lua_include.hpp>
00009 # include <luabind/config.hpp>
00010 # include <boost/optional.hpp>
00011 # include <boost/type.hpp>
00012 
00013 # if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1300)
00014 #  include <boost/mpl/if.hpp>
00015 #  include <boost/type_traits/is_pointer.hpp>
00016 # endif
00017 
00018 namespace luabind {
00019 
00020 # ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00021 
00022 namespace detail
00023 {
00024 
00025   struct LUABIND_API exception_handler_base
00026   {
00027       exception_handler_base()
00028         : next(0)
00029       {}
00030 
00031       virtual ~exception_handler_base() {}
00032       virtual void handle(lua_State*) const = 0;
00033 
00034       void try_next(lua_State*) const;
00035 
00036       exception_handler_base* next;
00037   };
00038 
00039   namespace mpl = boost::mpl;
00040 
00041   template<class E, class Handler>
00042   struct exception_handler : exception_handler_base
00043   {
00044 #  if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1300)
00045       typedef typename mpl::if_<
00046           boost::is_pointer<E>, E, E const&
00047       >::type argument;
00048 #  else
00049       typedef E const& argument;
00050 #  endif
00051 
00052       exception_handler(Handler handler)
00053         : handler(handler)
00054       {}
00055 
00056       void handle(lua_State* L) const
00057       {
00058           try
00059           {
00060               try_next(L);
00061           }
00062           catch (argument e)
00063           {
00064               handler(L, e);
00065           }
00066       }
00067 
00068       Handler handler;
00069   };
00070 
00071   LUABIND_API void handle_exception_aux(lua_State* L);
00072   LUABIND_API void register_exception_handler(exception_handler_base*);
00073 
00074 } // namespace detail
00075 
00076 # endif
00077 
00078 template<class E, class Handler>
00079 void register_exception_handler(Handler handler, boost::type<E>* = 0)
00080 {
00081 # ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00082     detail::register_exception_handler(
00083         new detail::exception_handler<E, Handler>(handler)
00084     );
00085 # endif
00086 }
00087 
00088 template<class R, class F>
00089 boost::optional<R> handle_exceptions(lua_State* L, F fn, boost::type<R>* = 0)
00090 {
00091 # ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00092     try
00093     {
00094         return fn();
00095     }
00096     catch (...)
00097     {
00098         detail::handle_exception_aux(L);
00099     }
00100 
00101     return boost::optional<R>();
00102 # else
00103     return fn();
00104 # endif
00105 }
00106 
00107 } // namespace luabind
00108 
00109 #endif // LUABIND_EXCEPTION_HANDLER_050601_HPP
